extendedInfo.description: Promoted as a part of Back To School '12 Campaign by PlayStore - https://play.google.com/store/apps/collection/promotion_2012_08_14_BackToSchoolNow with Synonyms, Antonyms, Pronunciation and Sentence Usage Add-On Packs to enrich your learning at discounted price.Are you an alacritous aspirant wanting to accoutre yourself with the gamut of the Anglican vernacular tongue ? Or did you not understand the last sentence ? If your answer to either of these questions is yes, !Works presents to all you aspirants and wanna-be 'peters' an easy-to-use vocabulary application that beats every other way of preparation.WordPrep Flashcards, as the name suggests, is an app that comes up with flashcard after flashcard on demand to help people learn faster. Now, you can browse words alphabetically, sequentially, randomly or you can even star the words that you find are important or difficult and revise them on demand. With extremely customizable features, !Works WordPrep Flashcards is all set to be the best way to prepare for your GRE, CAT and other competitive examinations and get better at vocabulary. Close to 5000 words and Ad-Free.Thesaurus PackWe at !Works are humid prepossessing men with full sized aortic pumps and so we came out with a "Thesaurus Add-On Pack" that will let you know synonyms and antonyms for words and you can sound smart.Usage PackWhat use is a word that does not belong in a sentence ? What use is knowledge when it cannot be used ? "Usage Add-On Pack" gives its users a great way to understand the usage of GRE words with examples that would simplify the language.Pronunciation Pack"Pronunciation Add-On Pack" is the perfect rendezvous point for  the English enthusiast and the purist of sound. This pack is for you if you did not read the word in the last line - rahn-duh-voo. It is time for you to sound smarter.Scholar PackIf your dream is to become an exponent at the toughest of words in the English language and add the hardest to pronounce words, in your repertoire and spend much lesser to do all that - All in One Bundle.Tags: GRE, CAT, PSAT, SAT, LSAT, GED, ESL, GMAT, ACT, MCAT, TOEFL, IELTS, PCAT, OAT, TOEFL, Barrons, Words list, Flashcards, Verbal preparation, Memory Cards, Alphabetical List, GRE Word List, Synonyms, Antonyms, Word Usages, Vocabulary builder, Pronunciation, Free Words List, Starred Words

reviews.title: Noamanfarooq
reviews.comment: Its really really really helpful app for learning new words. I like it very much and found very helpful. The developers have done a great job. They really did hard work in writing almost 5000 words and their meanings. There should b another separate Section for synonyms and antonyms.  Thanx to the developers.
reviews.author: noaman farooq

reviews.title: Must have for GMAT prep!
reviews.comment: Great app. Buttery smooth interface and the upgrade is so worth the money! JB Droid RAZR M
reviews.author: swapniel salaria

reviews.comment: Purchase Error : Even after purchasing the sentence completion pack , I am not able to use it
reviews.author: dharmesh shah

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: This is great app, but i think some additional features required: - that I can add my own words. - word and meaning can play continuously with audio by pressing start button.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Without words what is the point?
reviews.comment: Someone commented on 5000 words and probably true. But who decided on which words?  I was looking for RIM.   No rim but RIP.  Then you go word by word how to get out?   Back button goes back through cards but I found no way to actually escape to the main page.
reviews.author: Jeff Holicky

reviews.title: Better but...
reviews.comment: The latest update brought the flashcards back (Yay!), but the program only has Profile orientation (Aww...). My tablet case makes the resting position Landscape, which also feels more natural as flashcards. Please return the autorotation responsiveness like the first version. Otherwise, great job!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No difference after purchase
reviews.comment: Unable to use the functions as specified in the full version aftrr purchase. Kindly fix. Otherwise, its a good app.
reviews.author: Yogesh Wagh

reviews.title: Loving how this aids in teaching
reviews.comment: Can help anyone with their vocabulary regardless of what level they\'re on... (Cwill4eva)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Classic learning method
reviews.comment: Great for improving vocabulary using the stars to record strong/weak words. It would be even better if the words had phonetic pronunciations on the word side and sample sentences on the definition side.
reviews.author: Ace C

reviews.title: Great work
reviews.comment: Please add a feature of storing the app on the SD card. Useful in phones with limited internal memory.
reviews.author: Vaishnavi Srikanth

reviews.title: Very Bad
reviews.comment: The sound is not clear and it seems someone speaking with a strang accent....  I regrate buying this product. I don\'t where they get this 5 star rating......
reviews.author: Samuel Chewaka

reviews.title: Engaging
reviews.comment: Smooth interface. Easy and yet intriguing! Hope word collection changes/ updates regularly.
reviews.author: Rahul Chogle

reviews.title: Very disappointed
reviews.comment: The prononciation module doesn\'t work anymore. It useless for me now. And I took the bundle in app purchase. Could you please try to fix it.?
reviews.author: Remy Hamenyi

reviews.title: Galaxy Note2 Pronunciation not working
reviews.comment: I love this app but after purchasing combo, pronunciation module is not working.  Please fix this ASAP.
reviews.author: Naval Gupta

reviews.title: I\'m so distraught!
reviews.comment: I downloaded the app and began flipping through the words when I realized that pronunciation and sentence usage could be aquired for a small fee. After my purchase, I clicked on a word for its pronunciation only to hear a crude robotic voice botch the pronunciation. (There is no phonetic clue given either) Moments later, when I clicked on the word \"jaundice\" I read \"A medical condition in which\"... It turned out that the paid content crowded out the definition. A scrolling safety mechanism should have been
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: You are not showing all words at a time
reviews.comment: Hard to find each word. Difficult to search each word. Can\'t find all words at one place
reviews.author: kartheek sarabu

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: This is a great app and I love it. Only thing I would like to suggest to the developers is that in the flash cards if they add some synonyms then it would be a lot more helpful for the user. Anyways its a wonderful app. Thank you.....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Dysfunctional on samsung s4
reviews.comment: Downloaded app(paid) and every time I chose a category my samsung s4 asks if I want to open with Google-to- text or Samsung-to -text!! And neither one opens app!! And I cant get a refund!!
reviews.author: eric rodwell

reviews.title: Nonfunctional After Purchase
reviews.comment: I purchased the full version and now the app is nonfunctional. I will gladly give more stars when/if somebody responds to my email or just fixes the problem. Samsung Galaxy S4.
reviews.author: Katie Fitter

reviews.comment: Good app. Clean, crisp, fast. Typos though like in definition on card 4818.
reviews.author: Keith Biondo
